SYLARDHOME.CONTENT_ONE: Is an open access program (available via GitHub) that converts ELAN files to HTML and offers line-by-line playback of audio accompanied by transcriptions, translations, or other linguistic representations.
SYLARDHOME.CONTENT_TWO: Please join as a Visitor for full access to all SYLARD materials, or as a Contributor to put your own recorded, transcribed, translated or annotated materials online.
SYLARDHOME.REGISTER_CONTENT:
Unless otherwise indicated, all material is by default licensed as
CC-BY-NC-SA
SYLARDHOME.DESCRIPTION_SYLARD: SYLARD is a developing platform for the presentation and exchange of audio transcripts in indigenous languages ​​of Mesoamerica.
SYLARDHOME.DESCRIPTION_SYLARD_1: Each audio transcript allows you to view and synchronize the transcripts and translations with an audio hosted on another portal.
SYLARDHOME.DESCRIPTION_SYLARD_2: In this phase, we are nurturing the platform with conversations regarding ecological knowledge, in particular, the nomenclature, classification, symbolism, and economic use of flora and fauna in indigenous communities in Mexico.
SYLARDHOME.SYLARD_CONTENT: We put our App at your disposal so that you can use them in another portal. Don't forget to give us credit and it's Creative Commons.
SYLARDHOME.WE_BELIEVE: We believe in access to knowledge and in the proper use of it.
SYLARDHOME.INFORMATION: *We will handle your information in accordance with federal law on the protection of personal data.

SYLARDREGISTER.NAME: Name:
SYLARDREGISTER.WHAT_IS_YOUR_JOB: Tell about yourself and your interest in SYLARD
SYLARDREGISTER.IF_VISITOR: If you wish enjoy Visitor privileges
SYLARDREGISTER.SECONDARY_WHITE: Registration is required to document acceptance of terms and conditions of use and to protect the rights of speakers and contributors. As a Visitor you will have access to all SYLARD materials.
SYLARDREGISTER.IF_CONTRIBUTOR: If you wish to be a Contributor
SYLARDREGISTER.DESCRIPTION_PARR: Please first read Contribute audio and accept the Terms and Conditions for contributors.
SYLARDREGISTER.REGISTER_ACEPT: Contributors will be assigned privileges to manage their ELAN annotated audio collections. At present SYLARD is not a substitute for a permanent archive such as those affiliated with the DELAMAN archive network. Rather, SYLARD is focused on providing rapid access to recorded and annotated corpora for stakeholders, particularly native communities, scholars, students, and speakers.
SYLARDREGISTER.ACEPT_TERMS: I have read and accepted the terms and conditions.

Enjoy_the_diversity_of_our_collections!: Enjoy the diversity of our collections!
Enjoy_the_diversity_of_our_audio_annotat: Enjoy the diversity of our audio annotation!
SEND_EMAIL: We have sent an email to:
ACTIVATE_ACCOUNT: click on the link to activate your account.
IMPORTANT_PROCESS: *It is important to complete the process to be able to view the content, the email must be confirmed.
SEND_COLLABORATOR: We have sent your request to access as a collaborator. You will receive an email shortly if your request has been authorized.
PROCESS_CONCLUDE: As the process concludes, enjoy SYLARD content.
SPEED_UP_CONTENT: We did most of the heavy lifting for you to provide a default stylings that incorporate our custom components. Additionally, we refined animations and transitions to provide a smoother experience for developers.
USER_EXP_CONTENT: By utilizing elements and principles of Material Design, we were able to create a framework that incorporates components and animations that provide more feedback to users.
EASY_WORK_CONTENT: We have provided detailed documentation as well as specific code examples to help new users get started. We are also always open to feedback and can answer any questions a user may have about Materialize.
PROMO_COLLABORATOR: You can only request promotion to collaborator
